Widely considered one of the greatest football players in Israel, he had a promising future which was cut short by a fatal [[accident]]. ==Football career== * Won 2 championships with Maccabi Haifa. * Conceded only 18 goals in the 1985-86 season, the lowest in Maccabi Haifa's history. * Won [[Maariv]]'s 1986 "footballer of the year" award (i.e. the [[Most Valuable Player|MVP]] of the season). * Was goalkeeper of the [[Israel national football team|Israeli national team]]. ==Fatal accident== On 11 July 1987, Ran was killed on the "Guy" beach in [[Tiberias]] when he was hit by a passing racing boat whilst [[Maccabi Haifa F.C.|Maccabi Haifa]] were celebrating their championship in the [[Sea of Galilee]]. 14,000 people attended Ran's funeral. ==Career statistics== <ref>{{NFT player|pid=20424}}</ref> {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
